PC - The Paulson Collection of Ellen G. White Letters (1985)


July 16, 1901-6-                                               B-83-'01 

                                      St. Helena, Calif., July 15, 1901 Dear Brethren and Sisters: 

     You ask in regard to meat-eating. I will say that it is quite true that nearly all animal flesh is diseased. Many people are eating meat filled with consumption and cancerous germs. At the present day animals are suffering from all kinds of deadly diseases.
